data.comment: The big names in today's match at Lotto Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Lotto Park.
In the minute 31, Ritchie De Laet for Antwerp has been booked by Jan Boterberg and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half has come to a close in Brussels.
In the minute 62, Jeremy Gelin is booked for the away team.
Paul Mukairu is on a sub for Mustapha Bundu for Anderlecht.
Derrick Luckassen (Anderlecht) has replaced the possibly injured Kemar Lawrence at Lotto Park.
In the minute 73, Antwerp make their first substitution with Nill De Pauw replacing Jeremy Gelin.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Paul Mukairu.
Albert Sambi Lokonga with an assist there.
In the minute 78, Aurelio Buta (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Aurelio Buta with Koji Miyoshi. This is the second substitution made today by Ivan Leko.
Joshua Cullen is replacing Percy Tau for the home team.
In the minute 80, Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a third substitution, with Cristian Benavente replacing Nana Opoku Ampomah.
